mapper.select: select distinct host_no, reservation_count_today, reservation_count_total, income_today, income_total, to_char(record_date,'yyMMdd') as record_date, to_char(record_date , 'DY') as record_day from statistics_host where host_no=#{hostNo} and sysdate-record_date < 7 order by record_date
mapper.insert: insert into statistics_host values (#{hostNo}, (select sum(guest_count) from reservation where host_no=#{hostNo} and to_char(checkout_date,'yyMMdd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyMMdd')), (select sum(guest_count) from reservation where host_no=#{hostNo} and to_char(checkout_date,'yyMMdd') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyMMdd')), (select sum(price) from reservation where host_no=#{hostNo} and to_char(checkout_date,'yyMMdd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyMMdd')), (select sum(price) from reservation where host_no=#{hostNo} and to_char(checkout_date,'yyMMdd') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyMMdd')), sysdate)
